step-0-info: Please enter a valid email address where you will be sent a message containing a link to access the next step
step-1-info: Enter the new password that will beused for futures logins
generic-err-response: Somenting went wrong, please retry later
user-not-exists: The user you entered does not exists
email-sent: An email was sent to the provided email address
token-expired: The session is expired please repeat the procedure to make a new request
password-changed: Password correctly changed press the complete button to come back to login
